Usage: git-ws init [OPTIONS]

  Initialize Git Workspace and create all dependent git clones.

  The actual directory MUST be a valid git clone, which has been be either
  created by 'git init' or 'git clone'.

Options:
  -M, --manifest FILE  Manifest file. 'git-ws.toml' by default.
  -G, --groups TEXT    Group Filtering. TODO: more details. The setting
                       becomes default for all successive runs.
  -U, --update         Run 'git ws update' too.
  -f, --force          Enfore operation.
  -h, --help           Show this message and exit.
